title: Never Alone
description: After receiving Christ as her Savior, 18 year old Mercy finds herself out on the street, with no where to go, no family to help her and only her few church friends. Should she turn to her old playmate, now a handsome young man, or the young Minister who's crazy about her?Mercy Blyth, living during the War of 1812, finally takes advantage of her old friendsâ€™ kind generosity, but their grown son is too handsome to look upon as a brother.As soon as she leaves for a new life in New York City, however, she is unexpectedly met by him again, only to cause unnecessary heartache. And meeting another handsome young man, who pursues her soon after they meet, will she follow her heart or relinquish her girlish fears and rest in her new-found love, Jesus?
author: Faith Grubb
